code: class  Solution  {   public :   int  matchPlayersAndTrainers ( vector < int >&  players ,  vector < int >&  trainers )  {   int  ans  =  0 ;   ranges :: sort ( players );   ranges :: sort ( trainers );   for  ( int  i  =  0 ;  i  <  trainers . size ();  ++ i )   if  ( players [ ans ]  <=  trainers [ i ]  &&  ++ ans  ==  players . size ())   return  ans ;   return  ans ;   }  };
